cause.description:
This is a group were you can show your support to the navy , air force and the army . For they have fought it many countries to help and protect peace and human rights ! Cheers to all soldier out there !! I have pick the Billy Graham association for the following reasons: 1. They offer one hot meal a day to the troops family 2. They support many events of the canadian forces 3. It is a reputable organization
1. Support Red Fridays
cause.mission: Show Our Support To The Troops
cause.name: Support Red Fridays
